duties_responsibilities.duty: Pre-register and register patients with accurate patient demographic and financial data.
Collect patient balances, co-payment, co-insurance, or other payment types.
Verify coverage and ensure all insurance requirements are met.
Respond to customer inquiries and assist with departmental coverage as needed.
Manage daily appointment schedules and may transport patients.
Monitor OB Prosec/McKinley alarm system and assist with Cardiac Rehab departmental charge entry.

education_certification.credential: One year of medical office or related customer service experience required.
Demonstrated knowledge of Medical Terminology and CPT/ICD-10 coding preferred.
Knowledge of insurance process and regulations preferred.
